reviews.text: Second trip for us in the Jungle Club that have been modified for a better comfort. New bungalows and new houses increase the possibilities to stay there. No more reason to miss this place of nature and love.We've first planned to stay there 7 days but stayed more than 2 weeks... No air con in the rooms but really not necessary on that beautiful mountain, even in high season.
reviews.title: Paradise for mind

reviews.text: The Staff is really kind and interesting always there to help you to spend a great trip.
reviews.title: Would go back in a heartbeat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: (I forgot the VIEW..... THE view !!)
reviews.title: Amazing view!

reviews.text: Amazing.
reviews.title: Amazing amazing amazing!!

reviews.text: Stayed for 2 nights, and wished we could have stayed for longer.
reviews.title: View, place and service....with altitude

reviews.text: I stayed here for 6 nights in April and absolutely loved it! the view is simply amazing, and many days and nights were spent in the inifnity pool just looking at the ocean and city below. My accomodation was one of the single huts which was clean and comfortable. The restaraunt is very good, but maybe a little overpriced. Th location is a bit out of the way but that's what gives it the great view and shuttles are always available (free at two set times).
reviews.title: Amazing!! Beautiful Accomodation and Great Value!

reviews.text: From a Samui resident and after a disappointing eating experience at another place just a couple of nights before. We went to the Jungle Club just for dinner with visitor freinds. Not an easy drive into the hills but a superb location with the whole of Chaweng, the north-east of the island, and beyond spread at your feet on a balmy tropical night. What film makers dream of!
reviews.title: What a great experience!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service was honest, able and no nonsense as befits the name and nature of the place. The food was great - good Thai food, well served and at a price that did not try to over trade on the location and setting. Excellent value!
reviews.title: View to die for...location not so much

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not an easy place to get to ot find. One of the island's secrets and maybe it should stay that way! A treeasure
reviews.title: idyllic location + a sense of adventure

reviews.text: We were on Koh Samui for 4 days and wanted to have a little bit of beach time and some peaceful unwinding time as well. Our first three nights were booked at Jungle Club (they had a 3 night minimum to achieve an online booking when we were trying to book) but due to availability restrictions we actually had to move rooms from a lodge to a deluxe lodge after the first night. the bonus for Trip Advisor is that we can review two rooms with one stay ;-)
reviews.title: best hotel of our trip

reviews.text: My wife and I came across the Jungle club, via LP, four years ago.
reviews.title: Annual pilgrimage to serenity, friendship, amazing views, food and accommodation.

reviews.text: Being based in China, we had our annual holiday in Samui, and until this year (as a heavily pregnant wife needs a level surface to travel about, which has not stopped us, going there almost daily for a meal or two!), have started our Samui holiday at JC.
reviews.title: My favourite resort in Thailand

reviews.text: If you want somewhere to go to unwind your whole holiday, or spend the first part there before you move on to other islands, TJC is outstanding.
reviews.title: Wedding Bliss

reviews.text: As soon as you breach the recently completed concrete road (which now allows you to rent a car, Motorbike or give them a call and they can pick you up from the bottom for a small fee, to travel to and from TJC), you are in a slice of heaven.
reviews.title: Inconvenient to get to, nice when you get there

reviews.text: From the moment you step into the very cool restaurant/bar you are blow away by the view. And scattered along the ridge below the main restaurant are the most excellent chill out spaces, perfect for a couple to enjoy privacy or a few of you to kick back chat and enjoy the food served from the restaurant.
reviews.title: Jungle balming....

reviews.text: We stayed 3 nights here and they were definitely the best days of our trip around western Thailand.
reviews.title: Paradise on mountain

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located on a lovely mountain. Spent lots of time us gazing the great view. Even the pool had an amazing view. The only problem with the location was that a 4x4 jeep was required whenever wanting to go down to the town or back to the hotel. Although the jeep ride was always an interesting adventure.
reviews.title: Couldn't have been better, we'll definitely be back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was amazing and funny - making jokes all the time. They also helped us find decently priced transportation around the island.
reviews.title: PEACE IN THE HILLS

reviews.text: During our stay here we also saw some of the biggest geckos and loudest frogs of our whole trip.
reviews.title: A beautiful location high above Chaweng, Ko Samui

reviews.text: One slight surprise was that they only accepted cash payments in the hotel since the credit cards supposely didn't work on the mountain...
reviews.title: Amazing place with views of the islands
